sentences.en: Ans : Water baptism is the first step toward the witness of water.

sentences.en: Baptism is one of the sacraments in the Christian Church.
sentences.cn: 洗礼是基督教会的圣事之一.

sentences.en: Intoxicate in green mountain green water between, enjoy natural baptism.
sentences.cn: 陶醉在青山绿水间, 享受自然的洗礼.

sentences.en: Most churches baptize infants but some insist on adult baptism.
sentences.cn: 大多数教堂给婴儿洗礼,但有一部分坚持给成人洗礼.

sentences.en: The baptism of John, was it from heaven , or of men?

sentences.en: The campaign has been a baptism of fire.
sentences.cn: 这场运动等于是一次火的洗礼。

sentences.en: The Christian ceremony of baptism is a symbolic act.
sentences.cn: 基督教的洗礼仪式是一种象征性的做法.

sentences.en: The job's my baptism of fire.
sentences.cn: 这活对我真是一次严峻的考验.

sentences.en: The only divinely ordained sacraments are baptism and the Lord's Supper.
sentences.cn: 唯有浸礼和主餐是神命定的圣礼.

sentences.en: To refuse baptism and to retract after baptism were crimes punishable by death.
sentences.cn: 凡拒绝受洗和受洗后反悔的都以死刑论罪.

sentences.en: Today, many churches sprinkle infants on the head and call it Baptism.
sentences.cn: 今天, 许多教会把水洒在婴儿头上,称之为洗礼.

sentences.en: Under that baptism the plant lifts itself up; it drinks and rejoices.
sentences.cn: 在雨露洗礼之下, 它昂起了头,畅饮、欢欣.
